example.text: The VA Secretary and some of my Democrat Congressional colleagues are spreading false information and fear-mongering to make up for their lack of viable solutions to our soaring national debt.

Given Senate Commerce Committee leadership has followed suit with a companion bill, I am hopeful this whets the appetite for bipartisan, bicameral action on comprehensive privacy protections for all Americans. Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues to support this legislation, and I reserve the balance of my time.

Securing our border is an urgent matter of national security and a priority for the majority of my constituents. Today, I was proud to vote in favor HR 2, the Secure the Border Act of 2023, which fulfills our promise to deliver solutions to the #BidenBorderCrisis. [[url]]

When a weaponized DOJ and a DA that is more focused on pursuing vendettas and garnering national news attention than on ensuring the safety of the people he represents engage in the most outrageous politically-fueled witchhunt in American history, it is a sad day for the American people. I truly believe it will forever be remembered as a stain on our democracy.
As our nation grapples with rising crime rates, we need to give law enforcement officers the tools they need to solve these crimes and keep our communities safe! [[url]]
Today we commemorate the reunification of East Jerusalem with West Jerusalem following the Six-Day War of 1967. We will always support and defend our most steadfast ally, Israel. [[url]]
